messages.subject: CBS has a phone number just for Homeschool calls..
messages.msgSnippet: Please continue to call, write and fax. Thanks Vicky CBS is clearly tired of our phone calls. Do not let up! They have a number set up JUST to handle call
messages.messageBody:
Please continue to call, write and fax.
Thanks
Vicky

CBS is clearly tired of our phone calls.
Do not let up!

They have a number set up JUST to handle
call related to their Homeschooling story.
212-975-5005

Evening@...

Viacom President and CEO - Mel Karmazin 1-(212) 258-6000
(Viacom is the parent company of CBS)
